PackageOracle.name: DA_ORGANIZATION_HEIRARCHY
PackageOracle.source:
CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE CHTR.DA_ORGANIZATION_HEIRARCHY
/* Generated on 20-JAN-15 03.40.04.610901000 PM -06:00 */
AS

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,parent_organization_id IN NUMBER
,child_organization_id IN NUMBER
,org_heirarchy_type_cd IN VARCHAR2
,org_heirarchy_lvl_cd IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

PROCEDURE del (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,parent_organization_id IN NUMBER
,child_organization_id IN NUMBER
,org_heirarchy_type_cd IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

END da_organization_heirarchy;

body.name: DA_ORGANIZATION_HEIRARCHY
body.source:
CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE BODY CHTR.DA_ORGANIZATION_HEIRARCHY
/* Generated on 20-JAN-15 03.40.04.621060000 PM -06:00 */
AS

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,parent_organization_id IN NUMBER
,child_organization_id IN NUMBER
,org_heirarchy_type_cd IN VARCHAR2
,org_heirarchy_lvl_cd IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_organization_heirarchy.add, parms=' || parent_organization_id || '|' || child_organization_id || '|' || org_heirarchy_type_cd || '|' || org_heirarchy_lvl_cd || '|' || audit_user || '|');
INSERT INTO chtr.t_organization_heirarchy a
(
a.parent_organization_id
,a.child_organization_id
,a.org_heirarchy_type_cd
,a.org_heirarchy_lvl_cd
,a.record_stat
,a.created_dttm
,a.created_by
,a.modified_dttm
,a.modified_by
)
VALUES
(
add.parent_organization_id
,add.child_organization_id
,add.org_heirarchy_type_cd
,add.org_heirarchy_lvl_cd
,'A'
,SYSTIMESTAMP
,add.audit_user
,NULL
,NULL
);
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_organization_heirarchy.add');

END add;

PROCEDURE del (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,parent_organization_id IN NUMBER
,child_organization_id IN NUMBER
,org_heirarchy_type_cd IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_organization_heirarchy.del, parms=' || parent_organization_id || '|' || child_organization_id || '|' || org_heirarchy_type_cd || '|' || audit_user || '|');
UPDATE chtr.t_organization_heirarchy a
SET a.record_stat = 'D'
,a.modified_dttm = SYSTIMESTAMP
,a.modified_by = del.audit_user
WHERE a.parent_organization_id = del.parent_organization_id
AND a.child_organization_id = del.child_organization_id
AND a.org_heirarchy_type_cd = del.org_heirarchy_type_cd
;
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_organization_heirarchy.del');

END del;

END da_organization_heirarchy;
